title: Thanks riot for your stance on surrenders and your brand new definition of the word "majority".
body: Atleast all our games can be held hostage without punishment by a 0/55 bot lane that "wants to teach our jungler a lesson in why you dont pick fiddle". Only 45 minutes into the game now.

replies.body:
Okay, where exactly is the word "majority" used?
And supermajority is not exactly a new concept. Especially when it comes to inherently unevenly weighted outcomes (You cannot repeat vote after success, you can repeat after failure).

Also, this is kind of irrelevant, but if you're 45 minutes in with a 0/55 botlane your enemy team must be bad enough that you could actually still win this.

Screencap it. Post it on reddit for Lol@, and report their worthless asses.

Kiddie premades are great, right?
